headline: Agilent Presents Solutions Innovation Research Awards to Aarhus University, University of Graz, and Imperial College London Scientists
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., January 13, 2025--Agilent Technologies Inc. (NYSE: A) today announced Solutions Innovation Research Awards (SIRA) have been presented to Professor Anders Bentien of Aarhus University, Professor Walter Gössler of University of Graz, and Professor Gregory Offer of Imperial College London. These separate awards recognize their outstanding contributions to battery research.
